extendedIngredients.name: cuban
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 loaf (1 pound) Cuban or French bread

recipes.title: Cuban Breakfast Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Split bread in half lengthwise; cut into four pieces. Fry eggs in a large non-stick skillet coated with cooking spray until yolks are set. Layer bread bottoms with salami, ham, egg and cheese; replace tops.                                                                                           Cook on a panini maker or indoor grill for 2 minutes or until bread is browned and cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Cuban Breakfast Sandwiches in  Simple & DeliciousDecember/January 2013, p33                                                                                                                            Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Split bread in half lengthwise; cut into four pieces. Fry eggs in a large non-stick skillet coated with cooking spray until yolks are set. Layer bread bottoms with salami, ham, egg and cheese; replace tops.
Cook on a panini maker or indoor grill for 2 minutes or until bread is browned and cheese is melted.
